mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.praisedate AS "praisedate", a.praiseway AS "praiseway", a.reason AS "reason", a.score AS "score", a.student_id AS "student.id", u1.name AS "student.name", u1.cname AS "student.cname", a.booker AS "booker", a.bookdate AS "bookdate", a.confirmer AS "confirmer", a.confirmdate AS "confirmdate", a.approve AS "approve", a.status AS "status", a.opinion AS "opinion"
LEFT JOIN student_info u1 ON u1.userid = a.student_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_praise( praisedate, praiseway, reason, score, student_id, booker, bookdate, confirmer, confirmdate, approve, status, opinion ) VALUES ( #{praisedate}, #{praiseway}, #{reason}, #{score}, #{student.id}, #{booker}, #{bookdate}, #{confirmer}, #{confirmdate}, #{approve}, #{status}, #{opinion} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_praise SET praisedate = #{praisedate}, praiseway = #{praiseway}, reason = #{reason}, score = #{score}, student_id = #{student.id}, booker = #{booker}, bookdate = #{bookdate}, confirmer = #{confirmer}, confirmdate = #{confirmdate}, approve = #{approve}, status = #{status}, opinion = #{opinion} WHERE id = #{id}
